lead_paragraph: Wales flanker Dan Lydiate will undergo surgery on a knee injury he suffered in their final autumn test against South Africa and will miss the rest of the season, his Ospreys club announced on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Wales Flanker Lydiate Out for Season With Knee Injury
headline.main: Wales Flanker Lydiate Out for Season With Knee Injury

snippet: Wales flanker Dan Lydiate will undergo surgery on a knee injury he suffered in their final autumn test against South Africa and will miss the rest of the season, his Ospreys club announced on Sunday....
